prompt.username: Use your agent number as the username.
prompt.map_url: URL for viewing maps in your browser:
prompt.web_url: URL for editing the web site in your browser:

settings.mapZoom: Usually a value between 10 and 15. Higher numbers are more zoomed in.

import.merge: Import new data, and updates existing files with contents of the backup. Nothing will be deleted.
import.overwrite: Deletes all Submission data, replacing it with contents of the backup. You may want to backup your Submissions first, as this process can not be undone.

backup.simple: Store a ZIP file backup of monitoring data to the application folder
backup.usb: Create a backup and save it to your location of choice, like a USB drive

tiles.usage: To add new sets of tiles, create a subfolder in this directory with a name of your choosing, and copy tiles into this new folder. The folder name will be displayed in MapFilter as a map layer.

workspace.overview: This is where your data lives. You can create more workspaces if you have additional data you wish to keep separate

confirm.delete_form: Are you sure you want to delete this form?
confirm.delete_filter: Are you sure you want to delete this map?
confirm.change_workspace: Are you sure you want to change your workspace? Your new workspace will be
confirm.delete_workspace: Are you sure you want to delete this workspace?

message.settings_saved: Settings saved. Restart your app for settings to take effect.
message.workspace_created: New workspaced created. Restart your app for changes to take effect.
message.workspace_changed: Workspace changed. Restart your app for changes to take effect.
message.workspace_deleted: Workspace deleted. Restart your app for changes to take effect.

alert.running: The monitoring station will run as long as this window is open.

error.files_in_tiles_folder: There are files in the Tiles folder; only subfolders should exist here.
error.numeric_folder_in_tiles_folder: Some subfolders appear to be misplaced; perhaps you forgot to create a subfolder under Tiles?
error.workspace_conflict: A workspace already exists for this directory
error.workspace_not_found: This workspace could not be found; a restart may be required
